description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Microsoft Message Queuing Information Disclosure vulnerability (CVE-2024-20660), it is essential to apply the relevant security updates as soon as possible to mitigate the risk.

1. Identify the appropriate KB updates for your system from the links provided below.
2. Download the necessary updates from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
3. Install the updates on affected systems to resolve the vulnerability.
4. Restart servers or clients if required to complete the installation.

**Details**:
- The following KB articles are related to the updates needed:
  - KB5034134: [Install here](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034134)
  - KB5034123: [Install here](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034123)
  - KB5034122: [Install here](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034122)
  - KB5034121: [Install here](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034121)
- Ensure systems are backed up prior to applying updates.
- For all Windows Server versions and Windows 10 builds listed, verify that you have the latest cumulative updates for your OS.

**Preconditions**:
- Confirm that your system is one of the affected versions before applying the updates.
